thread.title: The Room was AWESOME!!
thread.title_full: The Room was AWESOME!! - Review of Q&A Residential Hotel, New York City, NY - TripAdvisor

author: mjmallory30
title: The Room was AWESOME!!
text:
The room.... the location.... the staff...ALL really GREAT! I recommend checking it out if you want to stay in the financial district. The Subway is near by; grocery stores are walking distance; and many other amenities are close. We will definitely stay there again.
Room Tip: Its a quiet neighborhood, so I assume all rooms are too. See more room tips
